message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to let it go for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $82. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product at this price.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above $82. Can you meet me at $75?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to give a bit more and offer the product for $79. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.
I'm getting close to my limit, but I still think $75 is a fair price. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your limit, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product for $78. It's the best I can do, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit away from my target. Can you meet me at $76?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product for $77. It's the best I can do, but I think it's still a great deal for you.
I'm not getting any younger, and I really want to make a deal. I'm willing to meet you at $75. If not, I'll have to go with John's offer
